website_summaries.verdict: While it's not quite as protective as the brand's top protective model, if you want an OtterBox phone case with a sleek design and less bulk, this is the one to consider.
pros: Offers both a dual protective layer and a thin design that feels good in your hand and pocket
Doesn't add extra bulk to your phone yet adds more protection than basic models
cons: Won't protect against all drops and bumps, but does so better than average cases

website_summaries.verdict: A top choice in phone cases for the Galaxy S8 that fits and protects well.
pros: Consumers with this case give it top marks for its fit, lightweight design, and reliability
Holds up well with extended use and is less bulky than some other phone case designs
cons: The lack of screen protector is an issue for some, and occasionally users report cracked screens after ground impact

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because I thought it can protect my s8 from drops. I dropped my phone from my waist pocket, fell to the concrete and hit the left side first. The screen cracked from the left side. Take note this is a flat surface concrete. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Cheap case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these phone cases for my sons new phones. Although the case did protect the phones, the cases are cheaply made, and do not last at all. If you try to remove the cases for cleaning your phone, they break on the sides, and this happened to both of the cases that I purchased. Although I did not expect them to last for years, I thought that they would at least last for a few months. I had initially heard great things about these cases, and I'm sure that they would have protected the phone if it was dropped face down, but, with that being said, after 2 months, they broke, so I will never know.
customer_reviews.author: dianefromri

customer_reviews.title: I Needed This
customer_reviews.text: Great fit yet easy hold. Buy this NOW. You will crack that S8 without it. The case rises up on the ends so your screen is protected but you can still use the edge features. The hole on the back makes it a lot easier to use the fingerprint scanner. Unfortunately I waited 5 days to buy this and cracked my screen. The first screen I've cracked in 15 years of cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Pauly

customer_reviews.title: Trying to protect screen and phone, This just isn't up to it.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I would have expected from OTTER Box, No screen protection at all! There apparently is no shock absorbing element to the case either. No, I would not recommend this case to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE T.

customer_reviews.title: I can drop my phone without breaking it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought me a different case (different manufacturer) and I hated it. It didn't allow me to access my entire screen nor did it protect my phone fully. OtterBox does. We won't buy any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great EDC case for most walks of life.
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these on my glasxy s8 for over two years now through all walks of life and activities. Definitely a great case. Fits a magnet underneath for a car mount well too, definitely worth the price and has gone down considerably since the phone model was new. Can't go wrong with this case if you want a sturdy casw without sacrificing too much in the look department.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Performs
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a teenager. So far working as described. I have one on my Samsung S6 in addition to other family members making me/us repeat customers and it has prevented disaster on numerous occasions when the phone has been dropped. Takes away the slimness of the phone making it more bulky but a small price to pay for the added protection. Once the included plastic screen protector gets scarred up recommend punching it out and just keeping the case and using a regular screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best case spend the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have had Otterbox commuter cases for my last 3 phones, best cases for many reasons. Not bulky, super protective never have to worry about the screen or phone breaking. The covers over the ports are a bit of a hassle at first but you get used to them. They do a good job of keeping dust and debri out, if you really hate them just cut them off with a knife and your all set. Spend a few dollars more and have the piece of mind of never having a broken phone.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Decent Case
customer_reviews.text: Case has served me well through the drops and falls. Had the case for just barely over a year now. Went to go take the phone out of my pocket but a huge chunk of the hard casing on the bottom completely chipped off somehow. I honestly have no idea how it broke off. Perhaps over time the corner weakened and eventually broke off, my guess. Problem is the warranty only covers it for a year after the date of purchase and I bought it only just over a year and one week ago. Just my luck.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pleased, only one downside.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today and I love the look of it. It is very sleek and, unlike the Defender series, it's slim. The texture is also very nice cuz it gives the case a little bit of grip. The only thing I have a gripe about is that the top 2 sides aren't held down by any of the hard plastic so they are loose. I don't forsee me getting to keep this case on my phone for very long because of that. My phone is constantly in and out of my pockets so that we put some wear and tear on those spots. Overall I'm pretty pleased, but that issue should be addressed for future devices.
customer_reviews.author: REZIAK

customer_reviews.title: Rugged, but pocket friendly
customer_reviews.text: I chose this case for two reasons: it's a very rugged case, but not overly thick. It has the cushioning rubber first coat, and the harder second coat which holds it all together. Tried and true. My only con (and a very nit picking con) is the covers they've put over the bottom jacks. They make it VERY hard to plug in, especially in low light situations. I opted to cut them off (carefully) with an Xacto knife.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Protector
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for Samsung Galaxy S8. Easy to use and does a great job protecting the phone. The flaps that cover the charging ports etc seem to be better made that the same series cover I had for my S4 and should last longer. Update: I have made it nearly two years without really testing this case. I am glad to say that it passed with flying colors. I left my phone on the back of my truck and it fell of at a speed of 45mph. The Galaxy S8 phone was unharmed and the case was no worse from the fall. The case has held up to daily use for two years and still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Zim5

customer_reviews.title: Just don't trip on concrete stairs!
customer_reviews.text: My phone works well with the case on and it does protect. I did have an incident were my phone launched itself down concrete steps and the phone flew from the case. My phone was shattered and I had to but a new one and the case was damaged badly too. Besides that I've used this same case several time and have only had to replace it twice in 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what you expect from an OtterBox
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what you expect from an OtterBox. The outside plastic is hard, so a little slippery, but it is textured so not a problem. I personally find the flaps on the charging port and audio port a bit of a nuisance, but can appreciate the extra protection they offer. Both installation and removal are very easy with this style. I have had no issues with any of the three wireless charging devices I have used with it.
customer_reviews.author: CurtDog

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I was looking for, but 4/5 is nothing to shake a stick at!
customer_reviews.text: I like the case for several reasons; it protects my phone as designed and advertised, I find it aesthetically pleasing, installation and removal are easy, and lastly it functions well. It doesn't hurt that the asking price, at time of purchase, was reasonable. My only complaint with this case is that it does not have any sort of rubberized grip on the top or bottom, only the sides. This can make your device more prone or apt to slips, trips, slides and subsequent falls. The best protection is prevention so I docked one star from my overall rating.
customer_reviews.author: Aric Hornback

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with alpha glass
customer_reviews.text: The case seems nice. Bought it for my dad who just upgraded from the s6. But this case does not fit well with Otterbox’s alpha glass even though they said it does. Either one by itself is good but once I put the case on, the glass slightly lifts up from the edges. This makes it so the screen isn’t as responsive, I found myself having to press harder down on the screen when setting up the phone for my dad. It’s just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin R

customer_reviews.title: The opening on the back makes it easy to use the finger print scan to unlock the ...
customer_reviews.text: OtterBox is one of the top company's when it comes to phone cases so it's no surprise that this is an exultant case. This 2 peace case fits perfectly on my Galaxy S8. The opening on the back makes it easy to use the finger print scan to unlock the phone. Also all of the buttons line up and work great. The only issue I have with this case is that the sides are to smooth so I have to make sure I'm holding on tight in order to keep it from slipping out of my hand. The is rubber by the buttons that provide better grip but who wants to hold their phone by the buttons?
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: It has no raised edge to protect the screen and it fits really really tight which makes it very hard to remove definitely not worth that much money there are $15 cases better than this I would add pictures but I don't want to have to try and pry it off my phone again
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mullinax

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for your phone.
customer_reviews.text: The case is very easy to put on and take off. I've dropped my phone a couple of times with no problems so it protects the phone well. The case is a nice texture, not so smooth that it is slippery but not so textured that it sticks putting in in and taking it out of my purse or pocket. The covers for the charging and headphones ports are easy to open and close and protect the ports from dust and dirt. The case fits well even with the screen protector I applied when I first got the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy M

customer_reviews.title: Seems to protect the phone well enough, but does not last.
customer_reviews.text: A little thicker than would be ideal. Seems to protect the phone well. The case prevents many USB type C flash drives from being inserted with out removing the case, or using an extension cable. Update: The outer hard shell cracked in less than a year. The crack is from the bottom of the camera "window" on the wide side to the edge of the shell.
customer_reviews.author: Echo78

customer_reviews.title: Love, love  the protection  this case provides.
customer_reviews.text: I use this case for my Samsung Galaxy S 8 for Boost mobile and my husband has the same phone on Verizon. We love this case. I have dropped it a lot of times and it did not break. I had the screen protector off and drop it face down and it was safe. Otterbox does a great job protecting the phone. It's worth the extra dollars. Our phones are expensive so protect them with expensive cases.
customer_reviews.author: R. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Adds a little bulk, provides good grip, still had broken screen after a fall.
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this would really protect my phone well, it does provide a lot of grip and makes an otherwise flimsy feeling phone feel like it has some substance. I dropped the phone once or twice and had Fairly good luck, but that third time it fell onto the corner and the case just peeled back enough to allow the corner to shatter. I shouldn't really complain, because I didn't want a very restrictive case so I got what I asked for.
customer_reviews.author: C.Q. Young

customer_reviews.title: Solid product but closes off the charger and headphone jack with "doors".
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a solid product. I just don't like the fact you have to mess around with the case to "open" the charger slot and the headphone jack slot. I wish they didn't have those "doors", but perhaps they do a good job at keeping the dust at bay, so I can live with them.
customer_reviews.author: David Klecker

customer_reviews.title: Best phone protection
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a new phone and made the mistake of paying too much at the cell phone store, when I should have ordered from Amazon instead. The phone store sold me an Otterbox defender, which I like fine, but I had a commuter case on my previous phone and I like the hard outer shell better. They're about the same thickness and protection level, but the commuter case slips in and out of my pocket a little easier and just feels better in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: chuckasaki

customer_reviews.title: Still holding up!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case on my phone since two days after I got the phone over a year and a half ago. Said phone gets dropped at least twice a week, and has been dropped from over 10 feet high. Still, the case only has a small crack along the bottom where the speaker hole is. Still works more than well at protecting the phone itself.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Discepola III

customer_reviews.title: Great But For A Klutz
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely clumsy and destroyed so many phones in the past. Got the S8 and decided to get this case. With a glass front and back the S8 was just waiting for me to drop it but thankfully this case keeps it nice and safe. Ive dropped it on accident from various heights and so far ttheres No scratches on the camera lenses, no cracks on either glass. The rubber on the inside helps to absorb shock and also makes it easy to stand up against anything on most surfaces
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Worthless protection for the s8 screen
customer_reviews.text: Worthless on the s8. Screen broke after first drop. The screen juts out further than the sides of the case rendering this useless if dropped on anything other than a completely flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: SBD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case fit snug on the phone
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case fit snug on the phone, keeps all the sensitive parts of it away from damage by really clever placement of "extra" bumps to keep them safe. Comes with protection for the ports at the bottom, is not 100% watertight but the phone is already resistant so it's a plus. The only thing I have an issue with was the top and bottom protections are so snug on the phone that can peel off other glass protectors if they are not properly set, so if you do add those give them 1-2 weeks to set before you use this case
customer_reviews.author: David Garnica

customer_reviews.title: Best case on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Always the best, I've always used Otter box cases and the quality can't be beat. I tried a lifeproof case on my new S8 and was not happy with it. Buttons didnt line up and case started peeling apart after a few weeks of use. Switched back to Otter box and Im a happy customer again. I definitely recomment this case for any phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jlong1180

customer_reviews.title: Amazing case
customer_reviews.text: Otter-box never disappoints. This case was dropped multiple times on many different surfaces but it still managed to keep my phone safe. Very sleek and slim, gives plenty of protection without being extra bulky, can never go wrong with it. This case will last you for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Great Armor For My S8
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect and does a great job. This has been on my phone for months now and its working great. Phone dropped to concrete a bunch of times (saying that makes me feel clumsy now) and it survived with no problems at all. The plastic on the outside makes getting in and out of my pocket MUCH easier that have that nonsense rubber on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Hupka

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: It fits the Samsung Galaxy S6 like a glove. It charges on a wireless charger with no problem and the ports holes are a perfect fit. I like the cover for the charging port as it helps keep dust out.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON T

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love the otter cases. It fits tight and snug..
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Very good protection.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd Otter Box I have purchased for my phones. They fit the phone you order it for and protect it very well. I will most likely be using another one for the next phone in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: So I was getting out of my sedan the other day and the phone fell out of my pocket. not a big drop, maybe 2-3 feet. The case cracked, with parts breaking off and the screen was cracked. The case itself does not cover the edged curve of the screen, so the screen is above the protection of the case. Given this is an otter box I am very disappointed that the case broke.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Corner of phone still broke.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to arrive the same time as my phone and put it on immediately. Unfortunately due the corner of my phone cracked when cropped from my lap getting out of my low car. I know the s8 has notorious screen issues but I would think the case would protect against a tiny drop like that. This is extra frustrating when I've own 3 different smart phones since 2011 and I haven't had a single screen crack until this phone+case. My advice, buy the phone insurance or buy a stronger case than this one. The case itself has held up well over the past months but thats kinda pointless if the phone breaks.
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Made really well
customer_reviews.text: This things awesome do hv 2b honest it didn't go my son from dropping it on rocks n the screen busted. So it did US no good. But that's his fault I would assume if u drop it on a flat surface it would protect your phone. It's well made n was an awesome price.
customer_reviews.author: shinaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I dropped my phone and the screen broke two separate times with my last case. I love this case! No drops so far but the buttons work so much better than they did in my Tech 21 case. Hopefully it will also protect it better.
customer_reviews.author: MaggieBAP

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built
customer_reviews.text: Had one for about a year before it suddenly cracked around the charging port for no reason. Dropped my phone a few time before that and it protected it pretty well so I'm buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mr A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This case fits perfectly, is comfortable to hold, looks great and will keep my Samsung S8 safe for years to come. I used an OtterBox case for an iPod many years ago and remembered how pleased I was, so I bought one for my phone. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gewaltraud

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't protect screen
customer_reviews.text: Phone survived 3 months in the case, one medium drop and the screen cracked. No protection. 0/10 would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OtterBox Commuter Series for Samsung Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.text: This Otterbox case is perfect for m Galaxy S-8 still using it after several years! Kind regards, Techie
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Practically Indestructible!
customer_reviews.text: The Otter Box is a great phone case. It makes my phone practically indestructible! The Galaxy S8 that I use this on is hard to hang onto without the Otterbox!
customer_reviews.author: CurlySue

customer_reviews.title: Very slippery
customer_reviews.text: The case protects the phone just fine, but the cover is VERY slippery. This makes my phone more prone to be dropped, needing the protection that much more. I wish I could have found an S8 cover in person so I could have felt the cover. If I would have come across this at a store, I would not have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: david h

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect phone
customer_reviews.text: My phone broke on the back which was supposed to be protected by the case. I wouldn't recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: chloe rommes

customer_reviews.title: Causes severe call echo on their end
customer_reviews.text: Dont get me wrong, I love this case. Fits snug, feels awesome in the hand, and DOES WORK with my wireless charger. I wish that there was a tad more stippling on the plastic so it's not so slippery. My brand new phone gets a real bad call echo on the other end with this case. I took it off and tried it again and got no echo that time. Would recommend if you rarely call people like me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't protect the phone
customer_reviews.text: So much for that...didnt help protect the phone at all. In fact the case itself broke when it was dropped along with the phone. The phone shattered!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli W.

customer_reviews.title: OtterBox covers have saved our phones - repeatedly!
customer_reviews.text: We all have OtterBox phone covers and they have saved our phones repeatedly. My husband has a habit of exiting his car with his phone on his lap which inevitably then ends up on the parking lot pavement. OtterBox has made it so we've never yet had to replace a screen or a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Von

customer_reviews.title: Phone survived getting yeeted many times
customer_reviews.text: I have accidentally yeeted my phone so many times with this case and it has survived! I also have a screen protector so that helps, but the case is definitely a factor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protects my phone and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nice. It's simple and protects the phone great. The price is really good as well. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Camara

customer_reviews.title: All time favorite case!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case. Double safe.. soft inside case hard plastic outside. I love it perfect for my phone. Extra wide opening for fingerprint scanner & rubber plugs for Aux & charger holes.
customer_reviews.author: Axel A.

customer_reviews.title: Great basic case that adds protection
customer_reviews.text: I think this case has saved my phone from a couple bad drops. The case cracked a little on one of the corners but I'd rather the case then my phone. Had this case now for 4 years and it still looks great. Long lasting and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Fits fine, just won't protect your screen
customer_reviews.text: Nice fitting, good quality product. Hard to protect the screen on the Galaxy phones with the beveled sides. This one offers little to no screen protection. It you break your phone this case will keep all the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: Splat

customer_reviews.title: Eight months in and still going great.
customer_reviews.text: I've had Otterbox products for my last three phones, and an iPod touch. They're very well made and have saved my phone from damage during countless drops. This is the first one I've gotten without a screen protector part as well, but I wanted the bevel screen to be free. Eight months in and still going great.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Did not protect me phone
customer_reviews.text: My phone still broke. Screen was replaced first time and second time I had to get a new phone. This was from minor drops, pocket height or less. Where is the warranty for replacement costs ?
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: One of the best cases I've had
customer_reviews.text: Protects my phone really well, but dry it out as well as you can if your phone gets wet cause I didn't and when I took the case off it smelled terrible. There was no mold or anything, but it didnt smell good
customer_reviews.author: Christian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sleek design!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone case! I am an avid accidental dropper of phones...after having to replace 3+ a year, I figured I better by a good case! I have dropped my phone multiple times and no scratches or cracked phone!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable and stable case.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this case for over a year now. No blemish, no breakage just a sturdy solid case and not bulky. Would sure recommend this item and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: emmanuel johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is a good case for your S8 from Otterbox
customer_reviews.text: Very substantive and secure protection, just as the Otterbox on my G7 offered the right balance between size and protection. And,very importantly to me, it works fine with wireless charging.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality case that will last for the life of your phone
customer_reviews.text: I had this same model case on my Galaxy S6 and it has served me well over the past two years. When I got my new phone, I knew this is the case i wanted and am not disappointed. Great quality case that will hold up over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen K

customer_reviews.title: It will not protect your screen.
customer_reviews.text: This case protects the back and sides of the cell phone but if you drop your phone face down, your phone's screen will shatter.
customer_reviews.author: 1911dsstrp45

customer_reviews.title: Good Deaign!
customer_reviews.text: Not bulky like the last Otter Box my husband had. He’s happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: MBT

customer_reviews.title: Very protective.
customer_reviews.text: This case hasn't failed me once. I've dropped it about 3 times since I've got it, but there's not a scratch, or anything on the screen or rear, and I do not use a screen protector. My phone does however slip out of my hands with this case often, I would advise getting a pop socket or grip to go on your phone if you use this case.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Denson

customer_reviews.title: Great phone case, but read this first
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchase this case before and enjoyed, it lasted me years and truly protected my phone. However, when I purchased this specific case, I found that it interfered with the microphone and people I talk to hear my voice echoing. I still highly recommend this case, but if you purchase one, make sure yours doesn’t have this issue before the window for returning it closes.
customer_reviews.author: RKO

customer_reviews.title: Best money can buy
customer_reviews.text: It has protected my phone from many drops. I've had it two years still looks new. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Briley

customer_reviews.title: Get it, you'll love it
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paid this is a really good case. I used the same type for my previous Galaxy S5 for more than 3 year, and was very pleased. It absorbs everything, and also in my opinion doesn't look to big or clumsy. This one looks great in my opinion, have nice grip next to the buttons (where you need it), and the hard shell plastic is very smooth, so it does not collect a lot of dirt. The screen is accessible, and I can use the S8's edge easily.
customer_reviews.author: LiC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my nephew and he loves it, so much more protection then his old case
customer_reviews.author: Ron Manus

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you like your phone
customer_reviews.text: This case has kept my phone safe for 20+ drops onto hard floors by my kiddo. The case is finally starting to crack, but there is zero damage to my phone. Otterbox will be on all my phones.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H.

customer_reviews.title: Fone case
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit.. tried to stretch it but it slips off other end.. Plastic outside part is not wide enuff either..
customer_reviews.author: DWF

customer_reviews.title: Will not protect screen edges
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok. It dose not make the phone feel to bulky and simple to install/remove. It will collect a lot of dust and the flap for the charging port and 3.5mm jack and kind of flimsy. With the phone having a rounded edge if dropped screen side down the case has little to no protection for you phone.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy compact case, built great
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this phone case doesn't make the phone feel bulky yet protects very well from falls.
customer_reviews.author: Arios

customer_reviews.title: Looks like and feel like it is strongly built
customer_reviews.text: There must be a design defect for this case. Looks like and feel like it is strongly built. I dropped the phone a few times without problem. But one time the phone fell from my pocket when I bend down. It dropped only less than 1 feet high to the flat ground but the screen cracked. So I guess there is a place that is not fully protected by the case. I do not recommend this product because of the defect place.
customer_reviews.author: sodotreehouse

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I like that it keeps my phone looking slim and yet protects it! Great buy, a little expensive, but the otterbox does command the price for the quality. I've have an otter box for my ipad mini for the last 7 years, love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Maria G.

customer_reviews.title: Good case, but beeds a screen protector.
customer_reviews.text: Like all otterboxes it is strong and protective of the phone except for it's screen. It needs a screen protector so that this expensive phone doesn't get a scratched screen.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Typical low quality case from otterbox, overcharging for junk products
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works for drops
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Saved me from multiple broken screens from dropping. I was skeptical on this at first but through multiple drops everything still looks good
customer_reviews.author: Casey Hall

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy 8 Remains Slim
customer_reviews.text: My first OtterBox purchase and pleased with the quality and size. The Galaxy 8 is still a slimmer cell phone in the protected case. Will consider the brand for other products.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Walk

customer_reviews.title: it's nicer and better edge protection
customer_reviews.text: Anyone that is reading this review, if you undecided between Commuter or Symmetry series for the S8. The answer is: Buy the Commuter series, it's nicer and better edge protection.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C. Crabbe

customer_reviews.title: Slim & Tough But Not Compatible with Whitestone Dome
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great quality, slim, easy to do fingerprint scanner thing. Cons: Don't really need the covers for the ports, especially charging port (which is used every day). Also not compatible with Whitestone Dome Glass.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: No screen protection. Other brand stick-ons work well.
customer_reviews.text: Great fall protection on a corner impact. I work construction and after purchasing a stick-on screen protector I feel the phone is well protected. Overall not bad. I just wish the screen was protected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... phone with this case on and it's done a great job protecting
customer_reviews.text: I've already dropped my phone with this case on and it's done a great job protecting. Not a single scratch or crack because of this case. Gotta love otter box!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Bond

customer_reviews.title: Durability and strength of a rock
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It has saved my phone more than 50 times. Durability of a rock! It is the best cover because it protects the S8 so well. 100/100
customer_reviews.author: Jose Matute

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I dropped my phone by accident from a 2 story building, not a scratch on the phone. Not the easiest to put on the phone initially, but once you get used to it, it's pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: John smith

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox.
customer_reviews.text: Buttons make it hard to take a screen shot. All else is great!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G. Fudurich

customer_reviews.title: Classic Otterbox quality.
customer_reviews.text: Classic Otterbox quality with an understated aesthetic. It feels rugged enough to take a beating, but also protect my phone. I really like the rubber flaps to keep lint out of the headphone jack and usb-c port.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Zak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case only problem being is that the edges rest ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case only problem being is that the edges rest right on my screen protector so peeled the corners up a little bit. cut off the excess pieces and it's fine. Definitely worth the buy as far as a protective case.
customer_reviews.author: Unqualified Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Worst OtterBox, doesn't live up to reputation
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, access to charging limited and awkward. Won't buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: B Nichols

customer_reviews.title: THE ORGINAL 4 ME!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST market I think! ITS EVERYTHING decribed by seller I'm purchase another one RIGHT NOW! I know this is truly protecting my phone the knock offs are just that l. I learned my lesson in ONLY buying the REAL THING!
customer_reviews.author: BACONGIRL

customer_reviews.title: I believed I was looking for the defender series but it's cool, good case nonetheless
customer_reviews.text: I actually got the wrong one. I believed I was looking for the defender series but it's cool, good case nonetheless. I like it, just wish I had the belt clip.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ortiz Jr

customer_reviews.title: it simply does not fit
customer_reviews.text: you cant get the case on the phone PERIOD. I have tried for 20 minutes. I gave it to a friend to try and she could not get it on either. This item is going back as fast as possible. I expected a lot more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: buyer beware

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Had to cut off flap covering charging port. Otherwise a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and is easy to put on and not to bulky. Don't forget to buy screen protector : )
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Protects What it Can
customer_reviews.text: Protected from drops I've had, but landing the screen on any uneven surface will prolly crack it
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Slim easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Slim easy to hold. Has saved my screen from a crack or two.
customer_reviews.author: bennylog

customer_reviews.title: This sucks, terribly dissatisfied and definitely woulnt buy from this ...
customer_reviews.text: Clearly states in headline of add that this is a case for a galaxy s8. It isnt. Not by a long stretch. The case is far to big, at the very least this is for an s8 plus if not the note 8. This sucks, terribly dissatisfied and definitely woulnt buy from this person again
customer_reviews.author: Carl & Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fits as described. Wish there was a glass protector version of this product but phone design prevents it. So, this is as good as it gets for the s8.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Well Done Otterbox!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and seems to protect the phone. Allows a solid grip without the feeling it is going to slide out of your hand. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is very easy to put on your phone, protects better than the slightly cheaper cases, I think that's because it has hard plastic on both ends instead of just the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Randell

customer_reviews.title: Dropped my phone from 2nd floor to1st floor with NO DAMAGE to my phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 2nd floor apartment. I dropped my phone... it bounced through the railing down to the 1st floor! Amazingly, there is NO damage to my phone!!! The salesman at the boost store a month before tried to sell me insurance ... I told him my Otter case IS my insurance! I will always have an Otter case on my phone!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sheT

customer_reviews.title: Testing durability daily.
customer_reviews.text: The back on this case is WAY to slippery. With any of my old cases I would maybe drop my phone once every month or two. I've only had this case for a week and I drop it at least twice a day. Just this morning I slowly pulled my phone out of my pocket and it goes flying to the ground. I've had enough
customer_reviews.author: mike

product_meta.title: OtterBox Commuter Series for Samsung Galaxy S8 - Frustration Free Packaging - Black
product_meta.description: You don’t have time to precision pack your briefcase. So pack along Commuter Series for Samsung Galaxy S8 — the slim, sleek case that fits into any pocket, purse or bag. Featuring two tough layers — an internal slipcover and exterior shell — Commuter Series keeps your smartphone safe from drops, bumps, dust and life on the go.
feature_bullets: Thin, lightweight 2 piece case provides protection against drops, bumps and shock (port covers block entry of dust and debris)
Screen protector NOT included. Materials - Synthetic rubber slipcover, Polycarbonate shell
Slides easily in and out of pockets
Includes OtterBox limited lifetime warranty (see website for details) and 100 percent authentic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,380 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
